ISSUE.TITLE: Document get TypeHandler tag is 'tagHandler',why not 'typeHandler'?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm confused with org.flowable.common.engine.impl.AbstractEngineConfigurator in the line 126( NodeList typeHandlerList = document.getElementsByTagName("tagHandler");) correct : NodeList typeHandlerList = document.getElementsByTagName("typeHandler"); ![图片](https://github.com/flowable/flowable-engine/assets/18155578/ef3f0501-7caf-474d-8a24-971c01a4ef0e) ![图片](https://github.com/flowable/flowable-engine/assets/18155578/81088275-8a86-4655-8cab-87d0c01a990e)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Move to Spring Boot 3.x supported version of Liquibase

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Use typeHandler instead of tagHandler in AbstractEngineConfigurator Fixes #3811
